title: The Wild Within
overview: Author and outdoorsman Steven Rinella embarks on an exciting global adventure as he explores the world's diverse cultures. Steven will reveal his deep conviction that within all of us, an instinctual hunter/gatherer is waiting to come out. In each breathtaking episode, Steven uses his pioneer spirit, resourceful mentality and outdoor skills to explore the subcultures that cherish and maintain their hunting, fishing and gathering traditions.
